title: Having a conversation with your taxi driver

content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. You are a foreign tourist having a conversation with your taxi driver in Beijing on your way to the Forbidden City. Press record to begin each response to the conversation. Response 1
